Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Yap \Yap\, v. i. [Icel. gj[=a]lpa; akin to yelp. Cf. {Yaup}.] To bark; to yelp. --L'Estrange. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Yap \Yap\, n. A bark; a yelp. [1913 Webster]
yap n : informal terms for the mouth [syn: {trap}, {cakehole}, {hole}, {maw}, {gob}] v : bark in a high-pitched tone; "the puppies yelped" [syn: {yelp}, {yip}] [also: {yapping}, {yapped}]
